segments.pli: “So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agāravo appatisso asabhāgavuttiko ‘sabrahmacārīsu ābhisamācārikaṃ dhammaṃ paripūressatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: “Mendicants, it’s simply impossible for a disrespectful and irreverent mendicant with incompatible lifestyle to fulfill the practice dealing with supplementary regulations regarding their spiritual companions.

segments.pli: ‘Ābhisamācārikaṃ dhammaṃ aparipūretvā sekhaṃ dhammaṃ paripūressatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: Without fulfilling the practice dealing with supplementary regulations, it’s impossible to fulfill the practice of a trainee.

segments.pli: ‘Sekhaṃ dhammaṃ aparipūretvā sīlakkhandhaṃ paripūressatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: Without fulfilling the practice of a trainee, it’s impossible to fulfill the entire spectrum of ethics.

segments.pli: ‘Sīlakkhandhaṃ aparipūretvā samādhikkhandhaṃ paripūressatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: Without fulfilling the entire spectrum of ethics, it’s impossible to fulfill the entire spectrum of immersion.

segments.pli: ‘Samādhikkhandhaṃ aparipūretvā paññākkhandhaṃ paripūressatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: Without fulfilling the entire spectrum of immersion, it’s impossible to fulfill the entire spectrum of wisdom.

segments.pli: So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagāravo sappatisso sabhāgavuttiko ‘sabrahmacārīsu ābhisamācārikaṃ dhammaṃ paripūressatī’ti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: But it is possible for a respectful and reverent mendicant with compatible lifestyle to fulfill the practice dealing with supplementary regulations regarding their spiritual companions.

segments.pli: ‘Ābhisamācārikaṃ dhammaṃ paripūretvā sekhaṃ dhammaṃ paripūressatī’ti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: Having fulfilled the practice dealing with supplementary regulations, it’s possible to fulfill the practice of a trainee.

segments.pli: ‘Sekhaṃ dhammaṃ paripūretvā sīlakkhandhaṃ paripūressatī’ti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: Having fulfilled the practice of a trainee, it’s possible to fulfill the entire spectrum of ethics.
Having fulfilled the entire spectrum of ethics, it’s possible to fulfill the entire spectrum of immersion.
Having fulfilled the entire spectrum of immersion, it’s possible to fulfill the entire spectrum of wisdom.”
